newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Seven killed as car sinks in Russian river.
newsitem.headline: Seven killed as car sinks in Russian river.

text.p: Seven people including two children drowned on Wednesday when their car sank while crossing a small river in Russia's southern Krasnodar region, Russian news agencies said.
The agencies quoted Emergencies Ministry officials as saying the off-road vehicle carrying nine people across the river Pshish fell into an underwater ditch and immediately sank.
